title: Ecclesiastica
description: Horizontal rectangle bound in black with purple cross forming the "T" in "Ecclesiastica." Contains nine designs appropriate for use in churches, cestries, etc. The patterns include: "Griffin", "Celestial Damask", "Symbolic", "Peacock", "Filigree", "Glorious Damask", "Doves", "Four Evangelists" and "The Cross".
name: Sample book
